content.raw: The test was failing in CI because a Publisher was shutting down before all of it's `OnPublishComplete` callbacks had been fired.  We can catch the exception here, but I don’t really like this answer.  I’m going to see if I can flush out all of the pending callbacks as the Publisher is being shut down.
content.html: The test was failing in CI because a Publisher was shutting down before all of it's OnPublishComplete callbacks had been fired. We can catch the exception here, but I don’t really like this answer. I’m going to see if I can flush out all of the pending callbacks as the Publisher is being shut down.
